requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 2 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6400 / AMD FX-8320
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 960 / R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7500 / AMD Ryzen 5 1400
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 / R9 390
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

results.name: Watch Your Step (B E A N)
